cast.overview: Recently divorced mom Lauren and widowed dad Jim let their friends push them into a blind date, which goes disastrously wrong. Unsurprisingly, neither wants to see the other ever again. However, fate intervenes when both Jim and Lauren, unbeknownst to each other, purchase one-half of the same vacation package at a South African resort for families, during spring break. They and their children are forced to share the same romantic suite and participate in a slew of family activities together.
cast.title: Blended

cast.overview: In 1973, 15-year-old William Miller's unabashed love of music and aspiration to become a rock journalist lands him an assignment from Rolling Stone magazine to interview and tour with the up-and-coming band, Stillwater.
cast.title: Almost Famous

details.biography: Susan Melinda Yeagley is an American actress best known for playing Jessica Wicks in Parks and Recreation. She married fellow actor Kevin Nealon on September 3, 2005 in Bellagio, Italy and gave birth to their first child, son Gable Ness Nealon, on January 29, 2007 in Santa Monica, California. She can also be seen as the God-loving prostitute Pillow in the Kerri Kenney-Silver "Dame Delilah" web series.
details.name: Susan Yeagley
